channel.title: teaching on Visible Data
channel.description: Recent content in teaching on Visible Data

item.title: Notes in class
item.description: Something I feel simulataneously confident & unconfident is whether I should give students handouts for my training courses before the event. It’s difficult to get a good handle on what other folks do. I ran an extremely pitiful Twitter poll with 7 responses (43% give handsouts during the course, 29% give handouts before). So I’ve decided to create a survey of both students and trainers that I will try to spread as wide and broadly as possible.
